Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! The US expresses a sense of mystery from unknowing population shifts across local community boundaries. The Netherlands discusses moral obligations to continue immigration to sustain national character. The US places monetary concerns about immigration as underlying reasons for apathetic responses, whereas in Holland people develop a kind of self-love-deficit over taxes.
